name: FG_OOR_LUT_ROUGH_DIM1
description: Out of range flag raised if SST value falls outside the acceptable limits

name: FG_OOR_LUT_ROUGH_DIM2
description: Out of range flag raised if 2nd LUT parameter falls outside the acceptable LUT range.

name: FG_OOR_LUT_ROUGH_DIM3
description: Out of range flag raised if 3rd LUT parameter falls outside the acceptable LUT range.

name: FG_CTRL_CHI2
description: Poor fit quality

name: FG_CTRL_CHI2_P
description: Poor fit quality

name: FG_CTRL_QUALITY_SSS
description: At least one critical flag was raised during SSS1 retrieval

name: FG_CTRL_SUNGLINT
description: Grid point with number of measurements flagged for sunglint above threshold

name: FG_CTRL_MOONGLINT
description: Grid point with number of measurements flagged for moonglint above threshold

name: FG_CTRL_GAL_NOISE
description: Grid point with number of measurements flagged for galactic noise above threshold

name: FG_CTRL_GAL_NOISE_POL
description: Grid point with number of measurements flagged for polarised galactic noise above threshold

name: FG_CTRL_REACH_MAXITER
description: Maximum number of iteration reached before convergence

name: FG_CTRL_NUM_MEAS_MIN
description: Not processed due to too few valid measurements

name: FG_CTRL_NUM_MEAS_LOW
description: Number of valid measurements used for retrieval is less than Tg_num_meas_valid

name: FG_CTRL_MANY_OUTLIERS
description: If number of outliers Dg_num_outliers greater than Tg_num_outliers_max

name: FG_CTRL_MARQ
description: Iterative loop ends because Marquardt increment is greather than lambdaMax

name: FG_CTRL_ROUGHNESS
description: Roughness correction applied

name: FG_CTRL_FOAM
description: Wind speed is less than Tg_WS_foam and foam contribution and foam fraction are set to zero

name: FG_CTRL_ECMWF
description: Flag set to false if one or more ECMWF data is missing for the different models

name: FG_CTRL_VALID
description: Flags raised if grid points pass grid point measurement discrimination tests

name: FG_CTRL_NO_SURFACE
description: Flags raised if the 42.5Â° angle is not included in the dwell line for grid points

name: FG_CTRL_RANGE_ACARD
description: Flags raised if retrieved Acard is outside range

name: FG_CTRL_SIGMA_ACARD
description: Flags raised if retrieved Acard sigma is too high

name: FG_CTRL_QUALITY_ACARD
description: Flags raised if at least one critical flag was raised during Acard retrieval
